data.text: -You have a lot of projects I want to talk about.

data.text: -Now, I know Migo has gotten you all very anxious

data.text: -I know, I know, because the stone says

translation.text: -Tôi biết, tôi biết, vì đá nói

data.text: there's no such thing as a smallfoot.

translation.text: không có thứ gọi là bàn chân nhỏ.

data.text: -Yep, right there.

translation.text: -Yep, ngay đó.

data.text: -But it was right there in front of me.

translation.text: -Nhưng nó ở ngay trước mặt tôi.

data.text: -Hey, Migo, how do you know it was a smallfoot?

translation.text: -Hey, Migo, sao bạn biết đó là một bàn chân nhỏ?

data.text: -It had a small foot.

translation.text: -Nó có một bàn chân nhỏ.

data.text: -Uh, Dad?

data.text: Because if Migo is saying he saw a smallfoot,

data.text: That a stone is wrong?

data.text: -If saying I saw a smallfoot means that a stone is wrong,
